name: AbcD12
description: The one everyone uses, was created in 1992 by an anonymous student, hasn't been maintained since 1993.

name: eFGh34
description: A very comprehensive and versatile standard, used by the e-Data-Base. Almost the same as iJkL56.

name: iJkL56
description: A very comprehensive and versatile standard, used by the i-Data-Base. Almost the same as eFGh34.

name: MNOp78
description: The best one, but no one knows it.

name: qrSt910
description: A new one under development. An effort of the global community within the QRST Network.
